title: (x) Mercedes-Benz typeface - Corporate A {Kent}
content:
![Text Description](http://web.archive.org/web/20141224232544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3234.jpg)   
   
this should be a walk in the park for you typegods, not for me though.... any identifyers?
author: anonymous

comments.content: For Headlines the type is 80% scaled.
did you get the batball? my kids love it. they can fling those plastic balls like nolan ryan. good ol' j.d. dunnack.
yup - that's exactly it - thanks for the help, bro!

The Mercedes-Benz corporate fonts were originally created by Kurt Weidemann and are available through MyFonts.com. This looks like a custom-condensed version of the [Corporate A](http://web.archive.org/web/20141224232544/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/corporate-a/) series.
